displayName.french: Termine le jeu en mode débutant... sans perdre ta tétine

description.english: Beat the game on casual difficulty while not losing your pacifier
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf leichtem Schwierigkeitsgrad, ohne deinen Schnuller zu verlieren
description.french: Termine le jeu en mode Débutant sans perdre ta tétine
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello facile senza perdere il ciuccio
description.koreana: 쉬움 난이도에서 고무 젖꼭지를 잃지 않고 게임을 이기세요
description.spanish: Supera la partida en dificultad casual sin perder el chupete.
description.tchinese: 在不搞丟奶嘴的情況下以休閒難度通關遊戲。
description.russian: Пройти игру на казуальном уровне сложности не выронив соску
description.japanese: おしゃぶりをなくさずに、難易度カジュアルでゲームをクリア
description.portuguese: Detone o jogo na dificuldade casual sem perder a sua chupeta
description.turkish: Emziğini kaybetmeden sıradan zorlukta galip gel

description.english: Beat the game on normal difficulty and don't be any special
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf normalem Schwierigkeitsgrad, ohne dich besonders von der Masse abzuheben
description.french: Termine le jeu en mode normal sans faire d'étincelles ni de coup d'éclat
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello normale senza essere speciale
description.koreana: 보통 난이도에서 게임을 이기고, 특별해지지 마세요
description.spanish: Supera la partida en dificultad normal sin ser nadie especial.
description.tchinese: 以正常難度通關遊戲，記得低調。
description.russian: Пройти игру на среднем уровне сложности и ничем не выделиться
description.japanese: 特に何事もなく、難易度ノーマルでゲームをクリア
description.portuguese: Detone o jogo na dificuldade normal e não seja nada especial
description.turkish: Normal zorlukta galip gel ve herhangi bir özelliğin olmasın

description.english: Beat the game on heavy difficulty and scream a furios roar after beating the final boss
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf hohem Schwierigkeitsgrad und lasse dein Freudengebrüll hören nachdem du den Endgegner besiegt hast
description.french: Termine le jeu en mode difficile et pousse un rugissement furieux après avoir dégommé le boss final
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello difficile ed emetti un ruggito furibondo dopo avere sconfitto il boss finale
description.koreana: 어려움 난이도에서 게임을 이기고, 최종 보스를 물리치고 격정의 포효를 지르세요
description.spanish: Supera la partida en dificultad difícil y suelta un rugido furibundo tras vencer al jefe final.
description.tchinese: 以困難難度通關遊戲，在擊敗最終頭目後，記得狂怒咆哮一番。
description.russian: Пройти игру на тяжелом уровне сложности и издать яростный рёв после победы над главным злодеем
description.japanese: 難しい難易度でゲームをクリアして、最後のボスを倒したあとに雄叫びをあげる
description.portuguese: Detone o jogo na dificuldade difícil e solte um rugido furioso depois de vencer o chefe final
description.turkish: Ağır zorlukta galip gel ve son bölüm sonu canavarını yendikten sonra öfkeli biçimde kükre

description.english: xDestroy everything on your way on Badass difficulty and try to not smash your phone
description.german: Zerstöre alles auf deinem Weg auf unmöglichem Schwierigkeitsgrad - ohne dabei dein Telefon zu zerschmettern
description.french: Détruis tout sur tout passage en mode Brutus (évite quand même de broyer ton téléphone)
description.italian: Distruggi tutto ciò che trovi sul tuo cammino al livello tosto e cerca di non lanciare il tuo cellulare
description.koreana: 거침 난이도에서 방해하는 모든 걸 파괴하세요. 하지만 전화기는 부수지 마세요
description.spanish: Destruye todo a tu paso en el nivel de dificultad Monstruo y trata de no cargarte el teléfono
description.tchinese: 在無法無天難度中摧毀路上的一切，別把你的電話砸了！
description.russian: Уничтожить всё на своём пути на безбашенном уровне сложности и постараться не разбить телефон
description.japanese: 難度バッドアスで行く手にあるものを全部破壊しつつ、携帯電話を叩き割らないようにする
description.portuguese: Destrua tudo em seu caminho na dificuldade Ferradão e tente não esmagar seu telefone
description.turkish: Sert çocuk zorluğunda yoluna çıkan her şeyi yok et ve telefonunu kırmamaya çalış

description.english: Beat the game on normal difficulty without getting hurt once
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf normalem Schwierigkeitsgrad, ohne auch nur einmal getroffen worden zu sein
description.french: Termine le jeu en mode normal sans subir de dégâts
description.italian: Completa il gioco al livello normale senza essere mai ferito
description.koreana: 한 번도 다치지 않고 보통 난이도에서 게임을 마치세요
description.spanish: Supera la partida en dificultad normal sin resultar herido ni una vez.
description.tchinese: 在正常難度下毫髮無傷完成遊戲
description.russian: Пройти игру на нормальном уровне сложности или выше не получив урона
description.japanese: 1度も傷つかずに、難易度ノーマルでゲームをクリア
description.portuguese: Detone o jogo na dificuldade normal sem se machucar nenhuma vez
description.turkish: Bir kere bile yaralanmadan normal zorlukta galip gel

description.english: Beat the game without using bombs
description.german: Beende das Spiel ohne Einsatz von Bomben
description.french: Termine le jeu sans utiliser de bombes
description.italian: Completa il gioco senza usare bombe
description.spanish: Supera la partida sin usar bombas.
description.russian: Пройти игру не прибегая к помощи бомб
description.japanese: 爆弾を使わずにゲームをクリア
description.portuguese: Detone o jogo sem usar bombas

displayName.english: AIN'T NOBODY GOT TIME FOR THAT
displayName.german: ICH HAB KEINE ZEIT FÜR SO WAS
displayName.russian: У МЕНЯ НЕТ НА ЭТО ВРЕМЕНИ
displayName.japanese: そんな時間は誰にもない
displayName.turkish: HİÇ KİMSENİN BUNUN İÇİN VAKTİ YOK

description.english: Beat any boss before the music track starts to repeat
description.german: Besiege einen Endgegner bevor das Lied von vorne anfängt
description.french: Terrasse n'importe quel boss avant que la piste musicale ne reprenne du début
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss qualsiasi prima che la traccia musicale ricominci
description.koreana: 음악 트랙이 반복되기 전에 아무 보스나 물리치세요
description.spanish: Vence a cualquier jefe antes de que la pista musical empiece a repetirse.
description.tchinese: 在音樂重複播放前擊敗任何頭目
description.russian: Победить любого босса до того как трек начнётся заново
description.japanese: 音楽トラックがリピートし始める前にどれかのボスを倒す
description.portuguese: Derrote qualquer chefe antes da faixa de música começar a repetir
description.turkish: Şarkı tekrar başlamadan bölüm sonu canavarını yen

description.spanish: Desbloquea todas las naves espaciales disponibles.
description.japanese: アンロック可能な宇宙船を全部アンロックする
description.turkish: Tüm mevcut uzay gemilerinin kilidini aç

description.german: Rüste ein beliebiges Schiff vollständig auf
description.french: Booste n'importe quel vaisseau au maximum
description.japanese: どれかの船を完全にアップグレードする

displayName.japanese: できるだけやっとこう

description.english: Upgrade all available spaceships and be a happy owner of an unbelievable collection
description.german: Rüste alle verfügbaren Schiffe auf und werde glücklicher Besitzer einer unglaublichen Sammlung
description.french: Booste tous tes vaisseaux disponibles pour devenir l'heureux propriétaire d'une collection purement et simplement génialissime
description.italian: Potenzia tutte le navicelle e sii il felice proprietario di una collezione incredibile
description.koreana: 가능한 우주선을 모두 업그레이드하고 이 믿기 힘든 컬렉션의 행복한 주인이 되세요
description.spanish: Mejora todas las naves disponibles para disponer de una colección impresionante.
description.tchinese: 升級所有的太空船，成為不可思議收藏的快樂主人。
description.russian: Прокачайте все доступные корабли и станьте счастливым обладателем невероятной коллекции
description.japanese: 入手可能な宇宙船を全部アップグレードし、信じられないようなコレクションの幸せなオーナーになる
description.portuguese: Aprimore todas as naves disponíveis e seja um feliz proprietário de uma coleção inacreditável
description.turkish: Tüm mevcut uzay gemilerini yükselt ve inanılmaz bir koleksiyonun mutlu sahibi ol
